title.text: RFC 3737:  IANA Guidelines for the Registry of Remote Monitoring (RMON) MIB modules

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                          B. Wijnen
Request for Comments: 3737                           Lucent Technologies
Category: Standards Track                                     A. Bierman
                                                     Cisco Systems, Inc.
                                                              April 2004
IANA Guidelines for the Registry of Remote Monitoring (RMON) MIB modules
contents.zh-CHS: IANA远程监控（RMON）MIB模块注册指南

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Copyright Notice
contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.text: Copyright (C) The Internet Society (2004). All Rights Reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（C）互联网协会（2004年）。版权所有。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document defines the procedures for IANA to administer and maintain the Object Identifier (OID) tree under the Remote Monitoring (rmon) root. This memo also documents the currently assigned values.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了IANA在远程监控（rmon）根目录下管理和维护对象标识符（OID）树的过程。此备忘录还记录了当前分配的值。

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: The RMONMIB Working Group so far has maintained its own registry for OID assignments for new MIB modules under the root OID for rmon [RFC2819]. This has worked reasonably well, although errors had to be corrected at a late stage one or two times, and a few now defunct assignments have been made as well.
contents.zh-CHS: 到目前为止，RMONMIB工作组在rmon的根OID[RFC2819]下为新MIB模块维护了自己的OID分配注册表。这项工作做得相当不错，尽管在后期必须纠正一两次错误，而且也有一些现已失效的任务已经完成。

contents.text: It is also a somewhat non-standard way of doing things, because normally a new standards track MIB module will get a MIB root assigned at the time that the module is being published as part of an RFC.
contents.zh-CHS: 这也是一种有点非标准的处理方式，因为通常情况下，新的标准跟踪MIB模块将在模块作为RFC的一部分发布时获得分配的MIB根。

contents.text: This document lists the currently assigned rmon OIDs. It also describes the procedures and rules for new assignments and asks IANA to take over the responsibility for existing and future assignments.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档列出了当前分配的rmon OID。它还描述了新任务的程序和规则，并要求IANA接管现有和未来任务的责任。

contents.text: The current assignments are not all too logical. Initially normal MIB OIDs were assigned under rmon, but at a later time the WG used the rmon root OID to create new MIB modules underneath it. Some
contents.zh-CHS: 当前的分配不太符合逻辑。最初在rmon下分配正常的MIB OID，但后来工作组使用rmon根OID在其下创建新的MIB模块。一些

contents.text: people will claim 'an OID is just an OID', and while this is true, it does not make things easier if the organisation of OIDs is not logical. However, we cannot change what has been assigned in the past. From now on, only MODULE-IDENTITY macro (MIB root) assignments will be made (by IANA) under the 'rmon' node. Within a MIB module, the working group authors/editors can then assign their own OIDs according to normal procedures.
contents.zh-CHS: 人们会声称“一个OID就是一个OID”，虽然这是真的，但如果OID的组织不符合逻辑，这并不会让事情变得更容易。然而，我们不能改变过去分配的任务。从现在起，（IANA）将在“rmon”节点下仅分配模块标识宏（MIB根）。在MIB模块中，工作组作者/编辑可以根据正常程序分配自己的OID。

contents.text: 2. Currently assigned OIDs under the rmon root
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 当前在rmon根目录下分配的OID

contents.text: At the time of this writing, the following OIDs have been assigned and IANA has picked up this information in their public registry of assigned values. They are listed as part of the already existing smi-numbers registry at:
contents.zh-CHS: 在撰写本文时，已分配了以下OID，IANA已在其分配值的公共注册表中获取该信息。它们列为现有smi编号注册表的一部分，位于：

contents.text: http://www.iana.org/assignments/smi-numbers

The assignments under ...mib-2.rmon were maintained by the RMONMIB Working Group until publication of RFC 3737. Some (early) assignments may not look all too logical. That is true, but that is history and cannot be changed. From now on, only MODULE-IDENTITY macro (MIB root) assignments will be made (by IANA) under the 'rmon' node.
contents.zh-CHS: 在RFC 3737发布之前，RMONMIB工作组保留了…mib-2.rmon下的任务。有些（早期）作业看起来可能不太合乎逻辑。这是事实，但这是历史，不能改变。从现在起，（IANA）将在“rmon”节点下仅分配模块标识宏（MIB根）。

contents.text: Key: nnn == { rmon nnn }
nnn descriptor OID Type Document
contents.zh-CHS: nnn描述符OID类型文档

contents.text:
0   rmonEventsV2          Notifications root       [RFC2819]
 1   statistics            OID                      [RFC2819]
 2   history               OID                      [RFC2819]
 3   alarm                 OID                      [RFC2819]
 4   hosts                 OID                      [RFC2819]
 5   hostTopN              OID                      [RFC2819]
 6   matrix                OID                      [RFC2819]
 7   filter                OID                      [RFC2819]
 8   capture               OID                      [RFC2819]
 9   event                 OID                      [RFC2819]
10   tokenRing             OID                      [RFC1513]
11   protocolDir           OID                      [RFC2021]
12   protocolDist          OID                      [RFC2021]
13   addressMap            OID                      [RFC2021]
14   nlHost                OID                      [RFC2021]
15   nlMatrix              OID                      [RFC2021]
16   alHost                OID                      [RFC2021]
17   alMatrix              OID                      [RFC2021]
18   usrHistory            OID                      [RFC2021]
19   probeConfig           OID                      [RFC2021]
20   rmonConformance       OID                      [RFC2021]
21   mediaIndependentStats OID                      [RFC3273]
22   switchRMON            M-I                      [RFC2613]
23   apm                   M-I                      [RFC3729]
24   available
25   pmCapsMIB             M-I (defunct)
26   dsmonMIB              M-I                      [RFC3287]
27   interfaceTopNMIB      M-I                      [RFC3144]
28   reserved for sspmMIB  M-I    [..rmonmib-sspm-mib-nn.txt]
29   hcAlarmMIB            M-I                      [RFC3434]
30   reserved for tpmMIB   M-I     [..rmonmib-tpm-mib-nn.txt]
31   reserved for raqmon   M-I  [..rmonmib-raqmon-mib-nn.txt]
32   reserved for raqmonDs M-I  [..rmonmib-raqmon-pdu-nn.txt]
Key: xxx == { rmon.rmonConformance xxx }
...mib-2.rmon.conformance (1.3.6.1.2.1.16.20)
xxx descriptor OID Type Document
contents.zh-CHS: xxx描述符OID类型文档

contents.text:
1   rmon2MIBCompliances   OID                      [RFC2021]
 2   rmon2MIBGroups        OID                      [RFC2021]
 3   smonMIBCompliances    OID                      [RFC2613]
 4   smonMIBGroups         OID                      [RFC2613]
 5   hcRMON                M-I                      [RFC3273]
 6   hcRmonMIBCompliances  OID                      [RFC3273]
 7   hcRmonMIBGroups       OID                      [RFC3273]
 8   rmonMibModule         M-I                      [RFC2819]
 9   rmonCompliances       OID                      [RFC2819]
10   rmonGroups            OID                      [RFC2819]
3. How to request a new assignment for a MIB module
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 如何为MIB模块请求新分配

contents.text: When anyone is writing a internet-draft for which a new assignment is needed/wanted under the rmon OID, then the proper way to do so is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果任何人正在撰写互联网草稿，并且需要/想要在rmon OID下完成新的任务，那么正确的方式如下：

contents.text: EXAMPLE-MIB DEFINITIONS ::= BEGIN
IMPORTS rmon FROM RMON-MIB
contents.zh-CHS: 从rmon-MIB导入rmon

contents.text: .. other imports ..
contents.zh-CHS: .. 其他进口。。

contents.text: exampleMIB MODULE-IDENTITY
contents.zh-CHS: 示例MIB模块标识

contents.text: ... other normal MODULE-IDENTITY stuff ...
contents.zh-CHS: ... 其他正常的模块身份信息。。。

contents.text:
::= { rmon nnn }  -- IANA: please assign nnn
                  -- RFC-Editor: replace nnn with IANA-assigned
                  --             number and remove this note
IANA will assign the number as part of the RFC publication process.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA将在RFC发布过程中分配编号。

contents.text: 4. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 安全考虑

contents.text: This memo describes procedures for IANA assignment of OBJECT IDENTIFIER values, and has no impact on the security of the Internet.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录描述了IANA分配对象标识符值的过程，对互联网安全没有影响。

contents.text: 5. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 5. IANA考虑

contents.text: IANA has picked up the initial set of assignments and integrated them into the existing registry for smi-numbers at:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已获取初始分配集，并将其集成到smi编号的现有注册表中，地址为：

contents.text: http://www.iana.org/assignments/smi-numbers
The list is presented in Section 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 清单见第2节。

contents.text: IANA is requested to maintain this registry for future assignments. New assignments can only be made via Standards Action as described in [RFC2434].
contents.zh-CHS: IANA被要求维护此注册表以备将来分配。新分配只能通过[RFC2434]中所述的标准行动进行。

contents.text: IANA will assign the number as part of the RFC publication process.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA将在RFC发布过程中分配编号。

contents.text: 6. Acknowledgments
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 致谢

contents.text: This document was produced as a result of discussion between the Operations and Management AD responsible for Network Management and the WG chair for the RMONMIB Working Group. Thanks to Andy Bierman for keeping and administering the registry up to this point in time.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件是负责网络管理的运营和管理AD与RMONMIB工作组工作组主席讨论的结果。感谢Andy Bierman及时保存和管理注册表。

contents.text: The document has been reviewed by the RMONMIB Working Group.
contents.zh-CHS: 该文件已由RMONMIB工作组审查。
